titleStmt.title: Love and loyalty; or, A letter from a young-man, on board of a English privateer, to his beloved Susan in the city of London. To the tune of, Tender hearts of London city. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
